name: fso-exercises-part3
description: Seperate respository for all the exercises of part 3 of the university of helsinkis full stack open course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd /home/fkohlhaas/projects/fullstackopen/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ~/projects/fullstackopen-part3-exercise
